bug.author: lluunn
bug.summary: kfctl latest 0.7 error: the server is currently unable to handle the request
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: kfctl apply has error: <denchmark-code>INFO[0559] Downloading secret user-gcp-sa from namespace kubeflow filename="gcp/gcp.go:1812" INFO[0559] Creating secret user-gcp-sa to namespace kubeflow-lunkai filename="gcp/gcp.go:1818" INFO[0559] Generating PodDefault in namespace kubeflow-lunkai; APIVersion kubeflow.org/v1alpha1 filename="gcp/gcp.go:1753" E1029 18:31:21.134882 47418 memcache.go:135] couldn't get resource list for custom.metrics.k8s.io/v1beta1: the server is currently unable to handle the request </denchmark-code>
Has anyone seen this before? cc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jlewi>@jlewi</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/richardsliu>@richardsliu</denchmark-link>
kfctl from 0.7rc6, with <denchmark-link:https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/fccc0ac/kfdef/kfctl_gcp_iap.0.7.0.yaml>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/kubeflow/manifests/fccc0ac/kfdef/kfctl_gcp_iap.0.7.0.yaml</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Issue Label Bot is not confident enough to auto-label this issue. See <denchmark-link:https://mlbot.net/data/kubeflow/kubeflow>dashboard</denchmark-link> for more details.
